mapper.select: SELECT mgm.`market_price` AS marketPrice, mgm.`good_name` AS goodName, mgm.`activity_price` AS groupPrice, mgm.`main_picture` AS mainPicture, mgm.`marketing_group_good_list_id` AS id, mggl.`good_list_id` AS goodListId FROM `marketing_group_manage` mgm LEFT JOIN marketing_group_good_list mggl ON mggl.`id` = mgm.`marketing_group_good_list_id` WHERE mgm.`status` = '0' AND mgm.`del_flag` = '0' AND mgm.start_time <=NOW() AND mgm.end_time >=NOW() ORDER BY mgm.`build_time` LIMIT 18
